general: Dear Aquarius, start your day by savoring little comforts that bring you solace. The Moon in Pisces aligns with Uranus, Saturn, and Neptune, asking you to find emotional balance. The entry of the Moon into Aries sharpens your focus, making it easier for you to tackle new challenges. Furthermore, Mars entering your sign ignites your motivation and lights the fire within you for the weeks to come. With the Sun and Pluto uniting their forces, you will be encouraged to evolve under the public eye. Do not hesitate to share your successes, as this could open doors for you thanks to the aspect of the Moon with Mercury and Venus later in the day.
love: Express your needs and desires sincerely.
work: Do not hesitate to showcase your achievements to attract new opportunities.
health: Take time to relax and recharge to maintain your balance.
advice: Courage and confidence, the world is waiting for you.
teaser: Awaken your motivation and shine today!
